EmailTemplate.subject: I Have X-Ray Vision Into My Banking Customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What if you had x-ray vision into each of your customers?
Or knew if they’d move completely to online banking, choose contactless ATMs or change brands?
What attracts consumers? What repels them?
It’s a big question—and a fascinating field of study. It’s exactly why:
NCR leads with research, so you can adapt to market changes.
Start with a new e-book, where we outline some of our latest consumer research. It’s not only eye-opening; it’s instructive, something you can easily create a plan from. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
